name: Earth Destroyer
description:
Can you imagine an alien invasion?
Which side you prefer to be? Destroyer or being destroyed?
Have you ever wanted to press Red Button of the weapon of mass destruction?
Will you miss the opportunity to demolish some of the famous landmarks on planet Earth?

Hopes not. Then try yourself as a warlike alien general. Your only mission is to deal as much damage as you can. But you have to spent your resources wisely so no one of miserable humans can avoid your wraith. Too brutal? Then imagine that this is just a puzzle game and do your job. Good luck, general!
